Posts.Content: Hel811 wrote: My Mum initially went yo the Dr with back pain after a few months she was finally offered an MRI scan , results came back and showed a " hot spot " . To cut a long story short she was diagnosed last week with cancer in her right breast and on her spine . I never went to the appointment with her but am I right in thinking this will be classed as Stage 4 ? . So many emotions running round at the moment , she started on femera yesterday , does anyone else have a similar story ? We know it's going to be a long and tough battle but any advice and stories of hope would be great at this time . Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Mum just diagnosed with bone mets to the spine . Hel811 Moderators
